professional.team17.com.professional.Entity

Class NotificationList

  • java.lang.Object
    • professional.team17.com.professional.Entity.NotificationList

  • public class NotificationList
extends java.lang.Object
    An entity class for a list which contains notifications. Notifications can only be added or cleared (they are cleared once they have been viewed).
    See Also:
    Notification, Profile

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NotificationList()
      When the object is created, it makes an ArrayList of Notification objects
